## GetFeatistics

Getting streamlined elaboration of targeted and non-targeted
metabolomics data, including elaboration of feature tables, separate QC
processing, advanced statistics such as multiple regression linear
models with mixed effects, and more! This is the GetFeatistics (GF)
package!

![](readme/GetFeatisitcs_logoGF.png)

## First: Install it!

Before installing, ensure the following are installed: - R (version ≥
4.3.1) - Java, with the same architecture as R (64-bit or 32-bit).

Then open R (or RStudio) and run the following in the R console:

``` r
if (!require("devtools", quietly = TRUE)) {  
  install.packages("devtools")
}

devtools::install_github("FrigerioGianfranco/GetFeatistics", dependencies = TRUE)
```

Follow the on-screen instructions to install all dependencies. It may
take some time, but when it finishes the package should be fully
installed and ready to use.

## Then, use it!

Just type:

``` r
library(GetFeatistics)
```

Then, an example of workflow is provided in the following picture.

Check also the vignette guiding you through the workflow step by step:

<https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/articles/GF_vignette.html>

For more details, here the full documentation for all functions:

<https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/>

If something is not clear, please contact me!

![](readme/GetFeatisitcs_workflowGF.png)

## Lastly; Cite it!

If you use the package, please cite it:

Frigerio G. Streamlining feature elaboration and statistics analysis in
metabolomics: the GetFeatistics R-package. ChemRxiv. 2025;
<https://doi.org/10.26434/chemrxiv-2025-fvdsq> *This content is a
preprint and has not been peer-reviewed*

## Credits

All the functions have been ideated, written, developed, tested, and are
being maintained by Gianfranco Frigerio. The work has been conducted by
Gianfranco Frigerio, during his work at three different institutions:

- Center for Omics Sciences (COSR), IRCCS San Raffaele Scientific
  Institute, Milan, Italy (researcher).

- Luxembourg Centre for Systems Biomedicine (LCSB), University of
  Luxembourg, Belvaux, Luxembourg (postdoctoral researcher).

- Department of Clinical Sciences and Community Health, University of
  Milan, and Fondazione IRCCS Ca’ Granda Ospedale Maggiore Policlinico,
  Milan, Italy (PhD student).

**Acknowledgement**:

All the people of the Proteomics and Metabolomics group (ProMeFa) of the
Center for Omics Sciences (COSR), IRCCS San Raffaele Scientific
Institute, are acknowledged for the support.

Albina Rastoder is acknowledged for helping with the testing of some
functions during her 2 months internship at the Luxembourg Centre for
Systems Biomedicine (LCSB) of the University of Luxembourg.
Prof. Dr. Emma Schymanski is thanked for the support and suggestions,
and the entire Environmental Cheminformatics group of the LCSB is
acknowledged for the help and feedback.

Prof. Dr. Silvia Fustinoni and the group of the Laboratory of
Environmental and Industrial Toxicology at the Department of Clinical
Sciences and Community Health, University of Milan, and Fondazione IRCCS
Ca’ Granda Ospedale Maggiore Policlinico are acknowledged for the
support.

**Research funding**:

Funding support from the Luxembourg National Research Fund (FNR) for
project A18/BM/12341006 is acknowledged.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`GetCombined_featTable_MSDial()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/GetCombined_featTable_MSDial.md)
  : Combining three tables of feature intensities in a combined table.
- [`QCs_process()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/QCs_process.md)
  : Filter a dataset of features considering pooled quality control
  samples.
- [`Volcano_lm()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/Volcano_lm.md)
  : Generate a Volcano plot from the table of linear regression models
- [`Volcano_ttest_FC()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/Volcano_ttest_FC.md)
  : Generate a Volcano plot.
- [`addINFO_to_table()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/addINFO_to_table.md)
  : Add the information from featINFO to a table.
- [`add_ChemData_to_featINFO()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/add_ChemData_to_featINFO.md)
  : Add chemical data to a featINFO table.
- [`all_PubChem_properties()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/all_PubChem_properties.md)
  : All PubChem properties
- [`auto_scale()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/auto_scale.md)
  : Auto-scale values
- [`build_long_vector_of_colors()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/build_long_vector_of_colors.md)
  : Build a vector with colors.
- [`check_if_fix_names_needed()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/check_if_fix_names_needed.md)
  : Check if names can be fixed
- [`checkmolecules_in_feat_table()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/checkmolecules_in_feat_table.md)
  : Check molecules in the feature table.
- [`clean_transf_colnames()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/clean_transf_colnames.md)
  : Clean colnames after transformation
- [`create_df_examples()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/create_df_examples.md)
  : Create example datasets
- [`cutP()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/cutP.md)
  : Cutting the P-value if \< 0.001
- [`do_FELLA_enrichment_analysis()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/do_FELLA_enrichment_analysis.md)
  : Perform FELLA Enrichment Analysis.
- [`export_figures()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/export_figures.md)
  : Export plots
- [`export_the_table()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/export_the_table.md)
  : Export the table
- [`fix_duplicated()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/fix_duplicated.md)
  : Fix duplicate names
- [`fix_names()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/fix_names.md)
  : Fix names
- [`from_AnnoLevel_to_ordered_number()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/from_AnnoLevel_to_ordered_number.md)
  : Get an numeric vector from a factor vector of annotation levels.
- [`from_ordered_number_to_AnnoLevel()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/from_ordered_number_to_AnnoLevel.md)
  : Get a factor vector of annotation levels from a numeric vector.
- [`gentab_FC()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/gentab_FC.md)
  : Generate a Table with Fold Change
- [`gentab_FC_more_than2levels()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/gentab_FC_more_than2levels.md)
  : Generate a Table with Fold Change even if the factor has more than 2
  levels
- [`gentab_P.1wayANOVA_posthocTukeyHSD()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/gentab_P.1wayANOVA_posthocTukeyHSD.md)
  : Generate a Table with P-values from one-way ANOVA with TukeyHSD
  posthoc
- [`gentab_P.2wayANOVA_posthocTukeyHSD()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/gentab_P.2wayANOVA_posthocTukeyHSD.md)
  : Generate a Table with P-values from two-way ANOVA with TukeyHSD
  posthoc
- [`gentab_P.t.test()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/gentab_P.t.test.md)
  : Generate a Table with P-values from a T-test
- [`gentab_descr()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/gentab_descr.md)
  : Generate a table with descriptive statistics
- [`gentab_lm_long()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/gentab_lm_long.md)
  : Generate a long table with complete results of linear regression
  models
- [`getBoxplots()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/getBoxplots.md)
  : Create some simple boxplots.
- [`getChemData()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/getChemData.md)
  : Get Chemical data from PubChem.
- [`getHeatMap()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/getHeatMap.md)
  : Get an Heat Map.
- [`getPCA()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/getPCA.md)
  : Get Principal components analysis.
- [`get_AnnoLevels_MSDial()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/get_AnnoLevels_MSDial.md)
  : Get the annotation levels.
- [`get_feat_info_from_MSDial()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/get_feat_info_from_MSDial.md)
  : Get a featINFO table from the MSDIAL export file.
- [`get_feat_info_from_patRoon()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/get_feat_info_from_patRoon.md)
  : Get a featINFO table from the patRoon outputs.
- [`get_feat_table_from_MSDial()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/get_feat_table_from_MSDial.md)
  : Get a table of feature intensities from the MSDIAL export file.
- [`get_feat_table_from_patRoon()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/get_feat_table_from_patRoon.md)
  : Get a table of feature intensities from the patRoon output.
- [`get_phase_amount()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/get_phase_amount.md)
  : Get the amount of mobile phases needed for a sequence.
- [`get_targeted_elaboration()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/get_targeted_elaboration.md)
  : Elaborating results of targeted analyses
- [`mean_scale()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/mean_scale.md)
  : Mean-scale values
- [`merge_results()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/merge_results.md)
  : Combining results from different chromatographic/polarity sequences.
- [`pareto_scale()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/pareto_scale.md)
  : Pareto-scale values
- [`plot_calibration_curves()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/plot_calibration_curves.md)
  : Plotting calibration curves of a targeted elaboration
- [`range_scale()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/range_scale.md)
  : Range-scale values
- [`round_the_result()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/round_the_result.md)
  : Round a number to defined digital places
- [`test_normality_Shapiro_table()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/test_normality_Shapiro_table.md)
  : Test normality with a Shapiro–Wilk test
- [`test_normality_density_plot()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/test_normality_density_plot.md)
  : Test normality by generating a density plot
- [`test_normality_q_q_plot()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/test_normality_q_q_plot.md)
  : Test normality by generating a Q-Q plot
- [`transf_data()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/transf_data.md)
  : Transform the data
- [`transpose_feat_table()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/transpose_feat_table.md)
  : Transpose features table.
- [`zero_prefixing()`](https://frigeriogianfranco.github.io/GetFeatistics/reference/zero_prefixing.md)
  : Zero prefixing numbers
